content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"VPN allows employees to connect securely to the internal corporate network while working remotely.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please look carefully through the materials below:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"size\":193771,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/135f8416-9379-4032-af97-2468bd594182/VPN usage - RU.pdf?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/135f8416-9379-4032-af97-2468bd594182/VPN usage - RU.pdf?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"VPN usage - RU.pdf\",\"name\":\"VPN usage - RU.pdf\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"pdf\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"iframe\",\"id\":\"135f8416-9379-4032-af97-2468bd594182\",\"extension\":\"pdf\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have questions, please contact your Resource Manager, HR, or send an email to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFADRResponseSPbDeliveryTeam@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFADRResponseSPbDeliveryTeam@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:privacy@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"privacy@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:privacy@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Tick the checkbox to certify that you understand and accept the terms and conditions of VPN usage.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
